entry.title: https://github.com/AtsushiSakai/PythonRobotics
entry.content: Python sample codes and textbook for robotics algorithms.

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/azure-search-openai-demo
entry.content: A sample app for the Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure AI Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.

entry.title: https://github.com/Soulter/AstrBot
entry.content: ✨易上手的多平台 LLM 聊天机器人及开发框架✨。支持 QQ、QQ频道、Telegram、微信平台(Gewechat, 企业微信)、内置 Web Chat，OpenAI GPT、DeepSeek、Ollama、Llama、GLM、Gemini、OneAPI、LLMTuner，支持 LLM Agent 插件开发，可视化面板。一键部署。支持 Dify 工作流、代码执行器、Whisper 语音转文字。

entry.title: https://github.com/abi/screenshot-to-code
entry.content: Drop in a screenshot and convert it to clean code (HTML/Tailwind/React/Vue)

entry.title: https://github.com/agno-agi/agno
entry.content: Agno is a lightweight framework for building multi-modal Agents

entry.title: https://github.com/assafelovic/gpt-researcher
entry.content: LLM based autonomous agent that conducts local and web research on any topic and generates a comprehensive report with citations.

entry.title: https://github.com/facebookresearch/xformers
entry.content: Hackable and optimized Transformers building blocks, supporting a composable construction.

entry.title: https://github.com/megadose/holehe
entry.content: holehe allows you to check if the mail is used on different sites like twitter, instagram and will retrieve information on sites with the forgotten password function.

entry.title: https://github.com/ocrmypdf/OCRmyPDF
entry.content: OCRmyPDF adds an OCR text layer to scanned PDF files, allowing them to be searched

entry.title: https://github.com/oumi-ai/oumi
entry.content: Everything you need to build state-of-the-art foundation models, end-to-end.

entry.title: https://github.com/tcgoetz/GarminDB
entry.content: Download and parse data from Garmin Connect or a Garmin watch, FitBit CSV, and MS Health CSV files into and analyze data in Sqlite serverless databases with Jupyter notebooks.

entry.title: https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui
entry.content: Create web-based user interfaces with Python. The nice way.

entry.title: https://github.com/zhayujie/chatgpt-on-wechat
entry.content: 基于大模型搭建的聊天机器人，同时支持 微信公众号、企业微信应用、飞书、钉钉 等接入，可选择GPT3.5/GPT-4o/GPT-o1/ DeepSeek/Claude/文心一言/讯飞星火/通义千问/ Gemini/GLM-4/Claude/Kimi/LinkAI，能处理文本、语音和图片，访问操作系统和互联网，支持基于自有知识库进行定制企业智能客服。
